oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Skyway Drive-In... The Wackiest Ship in the Army
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Motion picture theaters; Film posters; Motion Pictures; ; Nelson, Rick, 1940-1985
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and yellow on white) Hatch poster announcing the 1961 film schedule for Skyway Drive-In Threatre on Dickerson Road. Presentations include "The Wackiest Ship in the Army" starring Jack Lemmon and Ricky Nelson; "Operation Eichmann" starring Werner Klemperer; "4-D Man" in color starring Robert Lansing; and a 2nd feature "The Boy & the Laughing Dog".
